abilities.name: Shining Mane
abilities.effect: Your Pokémon in play have no Weakness.

attacks.name: Turbo Strike
attacks.effect: Attach 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Prominence GX
attacks.effect: Heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
